Physical Computing and Inclusive Design (Spring 2015)

This is the homepage for CSCI 5839: User-Centered Design, taught by Shaun Kane. The teaching assistants for this section are Gena Welk and David Quigley.

Meeting Time: Tuesday/Thursday, 2:00-3:15pm
Locaton: ECEE 1B32

For more information about the class, see the Syllabus, Calendar, and Piazza Discussion Board.

Please see the course calendar for up to date information on assignments and due dates.
